mapper.select: select *from provisioned_product order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into provisioned_product (servicecatalog_provisioned_product_id, provisioned_product_name, product_id, role_id, starter_id, status, parameter, outputs, create_time, gmt_create) values (#{servicecatalogProvisionedProductId}, #{provisionedProductName}, #{productId}, #{roleId}, #{starterId}, #{status}, #{parameter}, #{outputs}, #{createTime}, now())
mapper.select: select distinct servicecatalog_provisioned_product_id from provisioned_product where status = 'UnderChange'
